item.title: Fortnite Shock ‘N Awesome Season Details Revealed—New Enemies, Weapons, POIs and More
item.content:encoded:
Fortnite’s Chapter 6 Season 4, Shock ‘N Awesome, goes live tomorrow and ahead of that, the developers have revealed all the new additions of this season.

Fortnite’s Power Rangers collaboration was confirmed yesterday through a brand new teaser by Epic Games. The same teaser also revealed that Chapter 6, Season 4 is called Shock ‘N Awesome and will have players dealing with hordes of bugs. The latest blog post provides all the details of the new season, including new POIs, weapons, enemies and more.

Fortnite Chapter 6 Season 4: Shock ‘N Awesome Update Details

Bugs have infested Fortnite in the new season, and players will have to stomp and smash this swarm with the O.X.R., the Island’s anti-bug military defence force.

New Fortnite POIs

Four new POIs have been introduced in the latest Fortnite Season, including The Hive, Swarmy Stash, O.X.R. HQ. and Rangers Ruin. The Hive exhibits signs of high insect activity, and players are bound to encounter a swarm in this area. O.X.R. HQ is where players will find troops stationed in barracks, commanders at battle operations, an OXR Armoury, and more. The Rangers Ruin is a former weapons lab, formerly an O.X.R. base, that was overrun by an infestation. No specific details about Swarmy Stash were revealed.

New Fortnite Bug Enemies

There are three types of new bugs Fortnite will introduce in Chapter 6 Season 4, Shock ‘N Awesome, including the Swarmer, Bomber and the Queen. The Swarmer is a bottom-feeder, but it can take you down if not dealt with quickly. Bombers are bugs that are guarding nests. They can burrow and pop up behind the player and also attack with a goop lob from afar. Last, but not least, is the Queen, a massive bug that is taller than most buildings. She can body slam you or even summon more bugs to make your life difficult.

New Fortnite Shock ‘N Awesome Weapons, Boons and Medallions

When dealing with hordes of massive bugs, players will need appropriate equipment to take them down, and that’s where O.X.R. comes in. The game now features O.X.R. ranks, and all players start with a C rank and can progress up to S+ rank with their party. Each rank up will provide players with an O.X.R. Drop Pod, which brings a lot of loot and a Super Soldier Boon.

Weapons

There’s a special weapon, the Bug Blaster, which can shoot loose explosive plasma projectiles and deal a heavier attack when charged. The other new item is called Roly Poly, which allows players to roll and bounce around the map or charge it up and unleash a big burst of speed. There are some O.X.R. issued weapons too, including Leadspitter 3000 minigun, Sweeper Shotgun, O.X.R. Rifle, Wrecker Revolver, and the laser-guided Swarmstrike rocket launcher.

With this season introducing Power Rangers to Fortnite, we also receive a special themed sidearm, the Blade Blaster. It is a sci-fi energy pistol that can fire in quick-tap mode or charged bursts. The other exotic weapons and items include Eradicator O.X.R. Rifle, Double Trouble, Shock N’ Slow Shockwave Launcher, Marksman Wrecker Revolver and Exotic Slap Berry Fizz.

Boons

Coming to Boons, players will find new sets in O.X.R. chests and Hive Sacs, they can also be purchased from the Armory. There are three standard boons: Agile Aiming, Extended Magazine, and Storm Forecast. Then there are 4 Super Soldier-Ranked Boons, which are exclusive to O.X.R. drop pods. The Super Soldier Boon Rank B provides reduced energy consumption during sprint, Rank A boon provides Rank B abilities with increased reload speed. Rank S provides A and B abilities with reduced weapon recoil and spread, Rank S+ provides A, B and S abilities with increased sprint speed and unlimited energy.

Medallions

When clearing out swarms in certain POIs, players will be able to battle one of three Queen Bugs. Each bug provides a unique mythic weapon and medallion. Check out what each Queen provides at the three POIs below:

  • The Hive’s Queen delivers players with Mythic Enhanced Wrecker Revolver and Surge Medallion, which increases movement speed and gives a burst of speed when sliding.
  • Ranger’s Ruin Queen provides players with a Mythic Tactical Shotgun and Springleg Medallion, which gives you the ability to double jump, with fall damage immunity.
  • Demon’s Domain Queen pgives Mythic O.X.R. Assault Rifle and Carapace Medallion which gives 50 Health when you eliminate an opponent, and passively gives 3 Shield per second up to 50 Shield.

Whirlybird

Fortnite’s Shock N’ Awesome season will also introduce the Hammerhead Choppa later in the season. It functions like a helicopter and can briefly hover mid-air when players switch seats to lay down suppressing fire on the other side.

New Blitz Royale POI

Last but not least is the new Fortnite Blitz Royale POI, which comes with new medallions and mythics. On August 12, players will be able to take flight with Kinetic Ore as the new Oathbound Citadel POI arrives on the map. On August 19, new Medallions, Boons, and select Mythics & Exotics from Shock ‘N Awesome will be added. Interested readers can check out the latest battle pass here.

item.title: NHL 26 Features Include Be A Pro And Gameplay Updates
item.content:encoded:
EA Sports pulled back the curtain on NHL 26 on Wednesday, announcing the game’s release date, platforms, and new features. This year, the game focuses on gameplay updates, Ultimate Team and Be A Pro.

NHL 26 Features

Per EA Sports, the main updates coming to NHL 26 are:

  • ICE-Q 2.0 Powered by NHL Edge: “ICE-Q 2.0 utilizes powerful NHL EDGE data so you can think, move, and play like your favorite superstars.”
  • X-Factors: “X-Factors enhances an arsenal of 28 abilities over five different categories.”
  • Be A Pro: “A revamped Be A Pro mode allows the player to live their hockey journey from rookie to superstar.”
  • HUT Seasons: “HUT Seasons is an all-new, dynamic game mode experience where every match-up matters.”

More details on the new features will come in the form of deep dives closer to the game’s launch. What wasn’t announced, however, were what changes, if any, were set for the game’s franchise mode. It was also confirmed that online crossplay will be limited to World of CHEL and Hockey Ultimate Team (HUT) once again.

NHL 26 launches on September 12 for PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series X|S. In addition to the game’s features and release date, it was confirmed that Ottawa Senators forward Brady Tkachuk and NHL Legend Keith Tkachuk will join their brother/son Matthew (Florida Panthers) on the Deluxe Edition cover.
